Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 39th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Kendry Esparza (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Richard Dagostino (PHI)...
Injured on 4/15/2016 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Detroit, driving in 5 runs on 7/8/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2016, hitting .433 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2016, hitting .343 with 11 HR, 29 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2016, hitting .343 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2016, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won MVP in 2016, hitting .304 with 39 HR, 106 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 4/30/2018...
Injured on 9/20/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2019, hitting .611 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2019, hitting .313 with 9 HR, 30 RBI...
9/6/2019: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $15,670,000 per year, for 4 years.
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 9/18/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2020, hitting .348 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2020...
Injured on 4/16/2021 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
